name: HH_VO_IB_LINK
description: This table contains a list of Home Health verbal orders contained in the In Basket message.

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the task or message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HH_VERBAL_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the verbal order record.
